dcterms:description: A benchmark for N-body simulations that includes various settings such as the number of particles and physical constraints like hinges and sticks.

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of molecular dynamics simulations for eight different molecules, used for training and testing machine learning models in predicting molecular interactions.
dcterms:title: MD17

dcterms:creator: CMU
dcterms:description: A comprehensive database of motion capture data, containing various human motion trials used for analyzing and modeling human movements.
